1.content:
The time has come, to bring out the most secret, darkest, kinkiest and dirtiest of fantasies of the DOA ladies, and make them indulge in them.

But the big question remains, of which character, does our story centers upon?

(If you're not sure, just pick your favorite character)
1.title: The Beginning

11.content:
Kasumi, eh? The main protagonist of the franchise. Not a bad choice at all.

Well then, what kind of fetish does she get herself involved into?
11.title: The Kunoichi of Destiny

115.content:
So, what else does Kasumi get herself involved into?

(Remember. You can always add any new fetish,
of whichever you can think of, minus killing the character)
115.title: Something else for Kasumi?

12.content:
YEEHAW! Tina Armstrong, the american beauty and the champion of women's wrestling. Good one!

What kind of sexual activities does she indulge herself into?
12.title: Superstar of a Thousand Dreams

13.content:
Ah, the prima donna opera star and the Pigua Quan fighter. Now also, the current president of DOATEC, Helena Douglas. Nice one!

So, what did you have in mind for her?
13.title: The Fortune's Heiress

14.content:
Lisa Hamilton. Formerly of DOATEC's, nowadays the MIST's scientist.
Also known as the lucha libre -fighter "La Mariposa".

Not a bad choice at all.

Now then, pick up a situation.
14.title: The Luchadora

15.content:
Or maybe you prefer someone else? Those were not the only ladies of the character roster in Dead or Alive, so take your pick.

Which lady you choose to get involved, in various of fetishes?
15.title: More characters to choose from

151.content:
Ah, Ayane! The purple-haired beauty and the current leader of the Hajinmon sect of the Mugen Tenshin clan.
Also, Kasumi's half-sister.

She's been mistreated as an outcast in her youth, not having been shown the love she deserves.
Let's change that, shall we?

What is she into, then?
151.title: The Lavender Kunoichi

152.content:
Hitomi. The half german, half japanese karate practitioner.

In the canon, she has a thing for Ein/Hayate, but in this story, you can decide how her orientation is.

So, what's your choice?
152.title: The Fist of Innocence

153.content:
Leifang, huh? The chinese college student and Tai Ji Quan fighter.

But now the question; what kind of fetish is she into? (Or you can just decide, of what she's gonna get involved into) :D
153.title: The Tai Ji Quan Genius

154.content:
So, you prefer bad girls, huh?

Christie, the British assassin and the femme fatale of the DOA-series. Nice choice.

But, in which orientation does she lean into? Pick your poison. (No pun intended)
154.title: Blood Soaked Snake-Hands

155.content:
So none of those were your favorites? Don't worry, there's still plenty of more beautiful ladies
in the DOA-series to choose from.

So, which one do you like?
155.title: The list goes on

1551.content:
The Baji Quan fighter, Kokoro.
Apprentice geisha, college student and the half-sister of Helena Douglas. Not bad.

What's her fetish, then?
1551.title: The Ba Ji Dancer

1552.content:
Ooh, Nyotengu! The female tengu princess, whose life is still of a mystery, plus her personal alignment of neutrality only adds to it.
But that's not the issue here.

The question is, what's her preference (of your choice)?
1552.title: The Naughty Tengu Princess

1553.content:
Momiji. Ryu Hayabusa's apprentice and the Dragon Shrine Maiden of the Hayabusa clan.
Originally from the Ninja Gaiden -franchise, she made her debut in the DOA -games in Dead or Alive 5 Ultimate

Good choice. In which orientation, does she lean into, though?
1553.title: Dragon Shrine Maiden

1554.content:
The Warrior Woman. The Amazon. The leather-clad buxom babe with heavy weaponry. Rachel.

Like Momiji, she also originally from the Ninja Gaiden -franchise. Also she made her debut in the DOA -games in
Dead or Alive 5 Ultimate

Now then. What does our heroine get herself involved into?
1554.title: The Fiend Hunter

choices: (Was there still someone I forgot to mention)?
1555.content:
So, neither did any of those were to your liking? Not to worry, the DOA-character roster still has plenty of beautiful ladies to choose from.

Maybe one of these is more to your liking? Take your pick.
1555.title: Even more characters to choose from

15551.content:
Mila, huh? The MMA -fighter and one of the newer additions to the Dead or Alive character roster.
Okay then!

So, what did you have in mind for her, reader?
15551.title: Hot-Blooded Fighter Who Dares To Dream

15552.content:
(And here's something, for all of you Gothic Lolita fans out there)

Marie Rose, the swedish Systema -fighter, and servant of Helena Douglas. Made her first appearance in DOA5.

Choose her situation.
15552.title: Wicked Lil' Servant

15553.content:
The self-taught martial artist and also one of the newer addition to Dead or Alive, Honoka.

Made her debut in Dead or Alive 5 Last Round.

Again with the question, what does fate (or in this case, You) have in store for her?
15553.title: Super Secret Fighter Chick

choices: (On second thought, I'll just stick with the DOA characters)
15555.content:
For this choice the same rules apply, as with the previous options, except the story is told from your
(the reader's) perspective.
Choose your favorite DOA-girl and have fun with her. >:D

What gender are you, though?
15555.title: Your POV?

info.brief_description: Choose a character, create a scenario, and write your own, kinky DOA fantasy. Have fun! :D
info.description:
The female cast from the Dead or Alive -game series ▼
https://deadoralive.fandom.com/wiki/Category:Female_characters
get themselves involved in some of the most secret, most perverted, dirtiest and kinkiest of sexual fetishes.


And it's up to you, dear reader, to decide what they are. Sex. BDSM. Weight Gain. Muscle Gain. Hypnosis/Mind Control. Diapers. Bestiality. Bimbofication. Petplay... Just to name a few.

Here are a few examples: ▼
https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/List_of_paraphilias

But you can always add a new fetish, of which you can think of.

You can decide, whether the character is going to be straight, lesbian, or a bi-sexual.

NOTICE!

I will allow ANY fetish, but there are still some ground rules for this Interactive:

- No killing of the characters.

- This is a combination of Adult, Erotica, and Romance/Love, so you can decide for yourself, whether the characters indulge themselves, to the fetish of your choice either willingly, or unwillingly. That's why this item is rated XGC, just to be safe.

- You may add more characters on the same storyline, but keep the main focus on the character, of which you picked at the beginning of the story. ( i.e. If you choose Kasumi, then she becomes the main character in that storyline. If you choose Ayane, then it's Ayane, etc.)

- No one-word, or one sentence chapters! You know you can do better than that, so be creative and try to keep this a readable story.

- Use proper grammar. Things such as, "OMG!", "I dunno", " I wuw U!", are NOT allowed!
(Unless you choose to make a storyline of Bimbofication, then I'll allow it.)

- When adding a new chapter, make sure that you always leave a minimum of TWO options at the end of the chapter. The more the better
(from 3 to 5 options, if possible), but always a minimum of two.

- You can pair the female character with an SI-OC ( A.K.A. You, the reader) if you want to.
But if you do, choose a name for your character at the beginning. Or, if you can't decide for a name, then just simply put in, (Name).


I reserve the right of making more rules and edit them, plus the editing and deleting of the chapters, of which I find not following the rules.

(But mostly I'll be just checking on for possible grammar mistakes. I know, I know. My own writing's not perfect either, but I still try to make it readable, by the best of my abilities.)

If you have any questions regarding this Interactive Story, email me and I'll reply to you as soon as possible.
Other than that, be creative and HAVE FUN! :)
